snippet.title: KaraCube soft-launch trailer mobile
snippet.description:
Karacube is an enigmatic approach on color theory.

Change the color of your cubes to mix together colors of light rays matching their targets. Prepare for sophisticated puzzles that require you to activate rarely used parts of your brain.

The game comes with 40 levels in ever growing difficulty to play totally free. Advanced players can use a level generator to customize and automatically build their own stages.

Get it now:
App Store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.abrecat.karacube
Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.abrecat.karacube
Windows Phone https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/karacube/9nblggh4szkk

Web: http://www.karacube.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/abreCat
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/abrecat/
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Abrecat/posts
